summary: This mod edits the levelled lists for levelled unique items so that no matter what your level you will receive the best version.
descriptionHtml:
Descaled Uniques

This mod edits the levelled lists for levelled unique items so that no matter what your level you will receive the best version. If you have already received these items this mod cannot help you, it only effects when you are first given the item.

NOTE: Other items, like Dawnbreaker etc, are not levelled items, there fore this mod does not effect them.

This includes:
Weapons:
	Chillrend
	Dragonbane
	Gauldur Blackblade
	Gauldur Blackbow
	Lunar Iron Mace
	Lunar Iron Sword
	Lunar Iron War Axe
	Lunar Steel Mace
	Lunar Steel Sword
	Lunar Steel War Axe
	Nightingale Blade
	Nightingale Bow
	The Pale Blade
	Tsun\'s Battle Axe

Armor:
	Nightingale Armor
	Nightingale Boots
	Nightingale Gloves
	Nightingale Hood
	Shield of Solitude

Clothes:
	Amulet of Articulation
	Mage\'s Circlet

If there are more items that shouldn\'t be levelled, let me know and I shall try and update them into the mod.
author: Da Mage
